body.name: Sweetcrispy Queen Bed Frame - Metal Platform Bed Frames Queen Size with Storage Space Under Frame, Heavy Duty, 14 Inches, Sturdy Steel Slat Support, No Box Spring Needed
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 7 hrs 3 mins
features: [STURDY AND DURABLE] Our Metal Platform Bed Frame is supported by upgraded metal poles and legs, both made of durable metal. Designed to withstand the test of time, these components provide enhanced stability and the ability to bear heavier weights. The bed frame itself is constructed with heavy-duty reinforced metal poles, reinforced with thicker materials for added durability and stability. Rest assured, this bed frame is built to last.

[FASHIONABLE AND BEAUTIFUL] The Metal Platform Bed Frame showcases a fashionable and simple wrought iron frame design that adds a touch of modern elegance to your bedroom. Its sleek and understated design will effortlessly complement any décor style. Whether it's for your bedroom, guest room, dormitory, or hotel, this bed frame offers both style and functionality. Elevate the aesthetic of your space with this fashionable and beautiful bed frame.

[EXTRA STORAGE SPACE]The bed frame offers a generous amount of storage space underneath, allowing you to store your belongings conveniently. This efficient utilization of space helps to keep your room organized and minimizes clutter. Moreover, the added storage makes cleaning tasks much easier.

[EASY TO ASSEMBLE]Our bed frame is designed for easy assembly and can be put together in as little as 20 minutes. The package includes all the necessary hardware, tools, and clear instructions to make the assembly process effortless. You don't need to worry about finding additional tools or struggling with complicated instructions. With our bed frame, you can enjoy a hassle-free assembly experience.

[NO BOX SPRING]Our bed frame features a sturdy metal bed slat system that provides even weight distribution and robust support, eliminating the need for a box spring. This reliable metal strip supporting platform bed frame is specifically designed to extend the lifespan of various mattress types, including memory foam, latex, or spring mattresses. With our bed frame, you can enjoy optimal support and durability without the additional expense or hassle of a box spring.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 14“ Heavy Duty Metal Platform Bed Frame with Storage Space, No Box Spring Needed

Does this bed frame require a box spring ? The bed frame no need box spring, and you can put the mattree on it directly. What kind of mattress can this metal bed frame support? Our bed frame are designed to do it all! Rest your memory foam, latex or spring mattress on top for smooth snoozing. What is the distance between slats? For Twin and Full sizes, spacing is 4.86 inches. For Queen and King sizes, spacing is 5.14 inches. Are any tools required to assemble my metal bed frame? No. This bed frame is shipped with everything you need to assemble it - all parts, tools and instructions can be found efficiently packed in the shipping box. What's the return policy? Hello. The return policy is the same as all Amazon items. It can be returned within 30 days of receipt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice & sturdy. Real easy to put together. Bolts all fit perfectly. Looks nice, great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy Duty, super chic!
reviews.reviewText: I was really impressed with quality of this frame! It is heavy duty, it only took us 20 minutes to build, and looks great in our space! I love that it is steel, and the slats are raised in the middle for added support. I used a box spring to add height to my son's bed, but this frame serves well as a platform frame requiring no box spring! I will purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I needed a simple bed frame to keep my mattress from the floor. I saw this on sale and bought it right away after looking at other reviews. This was soooo easy to build I can't stress that enough took less than 30 minutes to set up. I had my sister roll around in it and jump no squeaky noises and very sturdy.Some things to note is that there is no guard to prevent the mattress from moving from the bedframe not an issue for me since I have backed against a wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The frame is made of sturdy material and connects to each other in appropriate multiple sections. The only issue is I had to reconstruct part of it due to some parts were constructed incorrectly from manufacturer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good sturdy bed frame!
reviews.reviewText: It is good and sturdy and was not at all difficult to put together! Nice and tall too! I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Made and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I don't have a photo but it looks just like the picture. It is very sturdyand very easy to put together. I am so happy that I purchased it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No lip so bed slides around
reviews.reviewText: This was very easy to put together and seems pretty sturdy so far (I've had it less than a week). The problem is that there is no lip, so my new mattress slides around on it. When I make the bed or even knock into it while walking by, the mattress slides over. The mattress is a 14.5", plush hybrid that weighed 112 lbs when it arrived, so it's not light and shouldn't move that easily. I wish there was a lip on the bed frame or at least something sticky or rough so that the mattress doesn't slide so easily on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, missing a piece
reviews.reviewText: The product seems like it’ll be sturdy, but when putting it together the middle bar was missing an entire slot to hold it down, so that piece is wobbly now.
